text: Alan Parsons (born 20 December 1948) is an English audio engineer, musician, and record producer. In 1975 he started a progressive rock band called The Alan Parsons Project. ==Other websites== * * * Alan Parsons Music Official Site * Alan Parsons Project Official Site * The Avenue, The Official Alan Parsons Fan Club * Crawdaddy! "Parsons Knows: The Tale of Alan Parsons and Edgar Allan Poe" *Alan Parsons Project official website Category:1948 births Category:English rock musicians Category:Living people Category:Musicians from London Category:British audio engineers
title: Alan Parsons
